name: Quick Draw
description: Prove you have the fastest hands in the West with this high-speed virtual reality game. Practice your skills, challenge your friends, and prove your worth as the Sheriff of town by defending it from ruffians.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: N/A
